overview.en: The DOY stablecoin is not only a collection of cryptocurrencies linked to legal currencies (USD, RMB, and other countries' legal currencies or precious metals such as gold and silver), but also a high-performance cryptocurrency for P2P transactions, suitable for daily transactions . To achieve this goal, the DOY stablecoin will be released on a secure public blockchain, using a faster proof of stake (PoS) consensus mechanism.
overview.zh: DOY 稳定币不仅是一组与法定货币（美元、人民币以及其他国家法定货币或金银等贵金属）挂钩的加密货币集合，而且还是一种用于 P2P 交易的高性能的加密货币， 适用于日常交易。为实现这一目标， DOY 稳定币将在安全的公共区块链上发布，采用更快的权益证明（PoS）共识机制。
